name: Desert Modern Canopy Bed Ralph Lauren (vray GGX)
description: Desert Modern Canopy canopy bed. The size is width 2100, length 2310, height 2440 mm. Table lamp Beckford Table Lamp. Height 650, diameter 380 mm. Table - Jamaica Side Table. Diameter 840, height 720 mm. Who works in the V-Ray version lower than 3.1, be careful, in the materials in the BRDF section there is a Microfaset GTR (GGX), if your version is older than 3.1, then the BRDF field will be empty. Choose Blinn, Phong or Ward - which is preferable to you. For close-ups on the fabric, you can apply the modifier TurboSmooth. The ropes are made using VrayDisplacementMod. FBX file without smoothing. Show more
